Class JkProjectOutLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.java.project.JkProjectOutLayout

  • public class JkProjectOutLayout
extends java.lang.Object
    Folder layout for a project output.

    • Method Summary

      void deleteDirs()
      Delete dirs all directories involved in output production (classes, test classes, test reports, generated sources/resources) but not the outputDir.
